name: Stuck in a Dream!
description:
"Stuck in a Dream!" is a fast-paced 2D platformer where you're stuck in a cycle of terrible dreams. Each dream is its own random, chaotic minigame with a random goal, random enemies, random map and much more! But beware, the dreams get harder and harder...
The game was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Controls:
Left-right: AD or arrow keys
Jump: W, space or up arrow key
Regular shot: Left click
Ultra shot: Hold left click (only works when full ammo bar)
Exit level: Esc (why would you wanna do that tho?)
